name: Road Car racing classic
description:
Road Car racing classic is a car racing games free
The goal is to reach the finish line within the stages without running out of time, hitting other cars or running out of fuel (fuel is refilled by hitting a special type of car)

You need to drive your car to avoid crashing enemy cars or holes.

Features
- Full levels
- Support Touch Control Type and Tilt Control Type
- Social network
- Total Free!
